name: Accuvia
overview: Headquartered in Potomac, Maryland, Accuvia is the foremost global provider of IT consulting and knowledge services focused on the foodservice, lodging, and retail industries. Operating since 1994, Accuvia has provided consulting services to a wide variety of clients around the world including the largest and leading quick service restaurant companies, resorts and theme parks. Accuvia has also provided consulting and other services to many of the leading technology providers in these industries. Accuvia is also affiliated with a number of leading industry technology events including various Hostec events internationally and FS/TEC in the United States as well as various industry resources including the Foodservice Tech Advisor (FTA) and Hospitality Tech Advisor (HTA)

milestones.description: Tech Global Partners and Accuvia Consulting Agree to Merge, Creating a World Class Consulting Firm Focused on the Retail, Foodservice and Hospitality Industries
milestones.source_description: Tech Global Partners and Accuvia Consulting Agree to Merge, Creating a World Class Consulting Firm Focused on the Retail, Foodservice and Hospitality Industries
